name: Grover the Rover
description:
Have a good laugh at our quirky version of a SpaceX mission to Mars! 

Play as Grover the Rover and dash around the surface of Mars to collect crystals while your energy creeps down. Bank your crystals at the SpaceX base to earn points before it's too late and you run out of energy or search for batteries to keep yourself going. All while listening to funny comments from the legend Elon Musk!

You can get in contact with us on twitter:
